metadata.synopsis: A depressed woman (Laura Linney) battles with her mother (Gena Rowlands) and abuses alcohol following the suicide of her husband.

reviews: To be seen only for the performances of these extraordinary actors, including Miguel Sandoval as a photographer and Lee Tergesen as the owner of the filling station.
With lesser actors on display, I shudder to think at how shrieky and pandering this production could have become. Fortunately, this one stars Laura Linney and Gena Rowlands.
